channel.title: Kinnera Rock Juggling Nyc on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Kinnera Rock Juggling Nyc on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: apparently i am teh r0x0r
item.description: well maybe not quite that extreme - but a bunch of cool/fun things happened today. first I was attacked on a juggling b board about my rattail - so I defended… a bit unsuccessfully - but I tried. then I am going to be helping with a secret project. which is going to rule. last night I yoyoed a bunch with mark.. and then hung out with morgan. it is nice to hang with morgan.
